channel.title: Rush Ville NEW || Stable Economy || Unique Credit System || 24/7 VPS Hosted ||
channel.description:
Rush Ville [b]Where Your Adventure Begins... [/b]
We are a Runescape Private Server that had a lot of time spent on and a lot of attention to detail to tweak a perfect, smooth and amazing economy.
We have a Credits currency. There are 2 shops with the gear everybody wants, for Credits. To gather your Credits you need to level-up, PK, skill, do Slayer tasks, complete mini-games and more!
NEW: You can now buy 250 credits for 50m GP to the NPC next to the Credit shop! [img]http://oi59.tinypic.com/502scn.jpg[/img]
If you guys are into PKing, then all the basic welfare PKing gear is FREE. But if you're feeling tough, then you can risk some Credit items in the wilderness!
We have also made ALL monsters drop Crystal Keys, these keys are used to open a chest at Edgeville so you can get a RANDOM CREDIT ITEM, and if you're lucky.. DRAGON CLAWS.
We have a lot of options for donators such as lowering their levels, dicing, ::bank, first 20 get a FREE custom ::yell title, a donator island, donator only portals and areas and more!
All skills work 100% All prayers work 100% All specials work 100% All mini-games work 98%
So? What are you waiting for, start your adventure today!
LINKS
Website link: http://www.rushville.net76.net (Webclient Available)
Instant download link: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/50ped86kg8ot085/rushville.jar?dl=1
We hope to see you there! :P
Annotated screenshots below!
[b]Credit Shops[/b] [img]http://oi57.tinypic.com/2d0zwir.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/2znz4o8.jpg[/img]
[b]FREE Basic Gear[/b] [img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/8vt9vl.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/3496gdj.jpg[/img]
[b]A Few Custom Items[/b] [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/w6ujra.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/11jyhwj.jpg[/img]
[b]Special Attacks[/b] [img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/2eb751f.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/16b11zb.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/20shxnd.jpg[/img]

item.title: Rush Ville NEW || Stable Economy || Unique Credit System || 24/7 VPS Hosted ||
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

If you have a smooth and amazing economy, then why are you selling fury and whip? Also all prayer works 100%? I guess wrath and prayers like that won’t work. Try to be real and give some more information about your server. What makes it different to other servers? Also I don’t like the customs but that’s just an opinion. Other then that goodluck.

Read full topic
item.source: Rush Ville NEW || Stable Economy || Unique Credit System || 24/7 VPS Hosted ||

item.title: Rush Ville NEW || Stable Economy || Unique Credit System || 24/7 VPS Hosted ||

item.description:
@Rush_Ville wrote:

Rush Ville
Where Your Adventure Begins…

We are a Runescape Private Server that had a lot of time spent on and a lot of attention to detail to tweak a perfect, smooth and amazing economy.

We have a Credits currency. There are 2 shops with the gear everybody wants, for Credits. To gather your Credits you need to level-up, PK, skill, do Slayer tasks, complete mini-games and more!

NEW: You can now buy 250 credits for 50m GP to the NPC next to the Credit shop!

If you guys are into PKing, then all the basic welfare PKing gear is FREE. But if you’re feeling tough, then you can risk some Credit items in the wilderness!

We have also made ALL monsters drop Crystal Keys, these keys are used to open a chest at Edgeville so you can get a RANDOM CREDIT ITEM, and if you’re lucky… DRAGON CLAWS.

We have a lot of options for donators such as lowering their levels, dicing, ::bank, first 20 get a FREE custom ::yell title, a donator island, donator only portals and areas and more!

All skills work 100%
All prayers work 100%
All specials work 100%
All mini-games work 98%

So? What are you waiting for, start your adventure today!
